context_aware_exceptions.name: Corner Window in Seismic Zone
context_aware_exceptions.condition: Window is in corner position AND seismic_zone >= 3
context_aware_exceptions.llm_instruction: Evaluate if additional lateral bracing beyond standard jack studs is needed for seismic loads
context_aware_exceptions.reason: Corner openings located in seismic zones 3 or higher require additional lateral bracing
